SEARCH
Package KI306.Mytsenko.Lab3

Class House

java.lang.Object
KI306.Mytsenko.Lab3.House
Direct Known Subclasses:
OfficeCenter
public abstract class House extends Object
The House class represents a house and its operations. It includes functionality for managing the number of floors, addresses, gardens and gives information about house . This class also logs events to a file named "Log.txt".

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    House()
    Default constructor for the house.

    Constructs a house with the specified address and defaults to one floor and no garden.

    Constructs a house with the specified address and number of floors, defaulting to no garden.

    Parameterized constructor for the house.

      public House(String address, int numberOfFloors, boolean hasGarden)
      Parameterized constructor for the house.
      Parameters:
      address - Specifies initial address.
      numberOfFloors - The initial number of floors.
      hasGarden - Specifies if the garden initially exists.

    • House

      address - The address of the house.
      numberOfFloors - The number of floors in the house.

      Add a floor to the house.

    • removeFloor

      public void removeFloor()
      Remove a floor from the house. If the number of floors is already at the minimum, log a message accordingly.
